} if (error) { return
Error: {error}
} console.log('user data: ',user) const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ defaultValues:{ idno: idno, firstname: '', lastname: '', image: '', username: '', password: '' } }); const onSubmit = data => console.log(data.idno); const firstname = watch('firstname'); const lastname = watch('lastname'); console.log('fname: ', firstname, 'lastname: ',lastname) return (

) }
